mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tj_testee_object_info
testee_object_name, testee_object_type, automatic_driving_level, vehicle_brand, vehicle_model, vehicle_type, vehicle_license, contact_person, phone_number, remark, testee_object_pic, create_time, createBy,
#{testeeObjectName}, #{testeeObjectType}, #{automaticDrivingLevel}, #{vehicleBrand}, #{vehicleModel}, #{vehicleType}, #{vehicleLicense}, #{contactPerson}, #{phoneNumber}, #{remark}, #{testeeObjectPic}, sysdate(), #{createBy},
mapper.select: SELECT id, testee_object_name as testeeObjectName, testee_object_type as testeeObjectType, automatic_driving_level as automaticDrivingLevel, vehicle_brand as vehicleBrand, vehicle_model as vehicleModel, vehicle_type as vehicleType, vehicle_license as vehicleLicense, contact_person as contactPerson, phone_number as phoneNumber, remark, testee_object_pic as testeeObjectPic, create_time as createTime, createBy, update_time as updateTime, updateBy FROM tj_testee_object_info WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, testee_object_name as testeeObjectName, testee_object_type as testeeObjectType, automatic_driving_level as automaticDrivingLevel, vehicle_brand as vehicleBrand, vehicle_model as vehicleModel, vehicle_type as vehicleType, vehicle_license as vehicleLicense, contact_person as contactPerson, phone_number as phoneNumber, remark, testee_object_pic as testeeObjectPic, create_time as createTime, createBy, update_time as updateTime, updateBy FROM tj_testee_object_info
AND testee_object_type like concat('%', #{testeeObjectType}, '%')
AND vehicle_brand like concat('%', #{vehicleBrand}, '%')
AND vehicle_model like concat('%', #{vehicleModel}, '%')
AND vehicle_type like concat('%', #{vehicleType}, '%')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
